website_summaries.verdict: The OnePlus X is one of the best budget phones of the year, but its limited LTE support make it a crapshoot for US customers who want high-speed data.
pros: The inexpensive OnePlus X is fast, beautifully designed and has some nifty customizable features
cons: The glossy handset is slippery and has limited compatibility with key LTE bands in the US

customer_reviews.title: Love this phone!
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone! Was an iPhone user since 2008, finally switched from that crap and got an android, and what an android! Have been using it for a month now and will likely NEVER get another Apple product. Awesome optons, versatility. finally a computer in my pocket that I can do almost anything with, compared to apple which decided what I needed my phone to be, or what the GUI was to look like. Great vendor, delivered on time, as promised, good tracking. Will do business with them again anytime!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy, some things to watch out for.
customer_reviews.text: Great sleek phone in proper packaging and comes with a case and durable charging cable. However, it comes with a European power adapter which I can't use in Canada, luckily I had one from my old phone but it should have been listed in the description. Came very very quickly which was bad for me because I was out of town. Otherwise very excited to use this phone.
customer_reviews.author: aaranya

customer_reviews.title: Nice nice nice
customer_reviews.text: It's really pretty, doesn't heats, is fast, and came with all the specifications written by the seller. There is just two things: The google search bar it has on the main screen. I can't remove it. OK I can live with that, but for me you should be able to remove it. The other thing is the block screen: I can't configure it so it doesn't sound when I block the phone, or every time I touch the screen. I can live with that too. That's all by now jaja
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Martín

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: Phenomenal value for the money. I was expecting an inferior product to the flagship devices instead I quickly realized that the device is above household brands Apple and Samsung. After having every iPhone from the first to the 6plus and after note 7. This is something I can see myself sticking with. Strongly recommend it. Dont give your money away!
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: its ok but the problem is that i had to ...
customer_reviews.text: its ok but the problem is that i had to download a specific app to manually turn the phones ear piece and speaker back on and there is no one to get a hold of to have it replaced. NO warranty support
customer_reviews.author: Marion VanDruff

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone as soon as I first used it. This device is fast and offers great practical features. I love the camera and screen.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: I just need a stupid charger. How hard can it be
customer_reviews.text: I've had this phone for over three weeks, but I still don't have a charger. It came with a 200 volt charger, and I'm in the US. I've spent hours (literally) on the phone with four different tech-support people at OnePlus, each says they can't help, and that I will get a call from someone who can help, but nobody ever calls. Three weeks now. I just need a stupid charger. How hard can it be? Customer service is worthless - and so is the phone without a charger.
customer_reviews.author: Wiley

customer_reviews.title: Missing / Replaced accessories
customer_reviews.text: I have received the phone yesterday the phone is OK but I have a complains: 1. NO head phones 2. NO user manual 3. NO sim card eject tool 4. charger USB cable is NOT Original 5. plastic cover is NOT Original 5. came in ugly red packaging, NOT Original oneplus box.
customer_reviews.author: Legemat

customer_reviews.title: I like this brand
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy. Great phone, until I dropped it in the water
customer_reviews.author: Maurice Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Got what i expected minus the mem card issue
customer_reviews.text: Love the phone.... The cam quality both rear and front are exceptional. I love the cool gesture features on it as well... I do have one major issue though...it doesn't read my memory card and I use up a lot of memory
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the cellphone, but hate the seller, DOCOOLER, DO NOT BUY FROM THERE!! I bought it from BuyeRush.
customer_reviews.author: Diego Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the phone, good product , nice slim design. Excellent
customer_reviews.author: Raiko

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: This is the best phone i've had in a loooong time. Super sleek looking with a glass front and back and close to stock android makes it run super smooth. It was supposed to have connection issues where i live, Bellevue/Seattle, WA, but it has worked flawlessly and always connected to 4g LTE. I would keep this phone forever if it wasn't for the so-so camera. takes ok pictures but nothing amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Brady

customer_reviews.title: pay shipping fees for a device that will not work.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a OnePlus X phone and this phone would not connect to the Wifi internet, I am planning to return the phone and hate that I have to pay shipping fees during the purchase and now i have to pay shipping for the return too... this is all for a device that is not working. I will end up paying almost $30 in just shipping cost.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Oneplus company sells phones but forget service after. I ...
customer_reviews.text: Oneplus company sells phones but forget service after.I have bought a oneplus one phone and I have problem with capacitive buttons. Itried to contact company through their website but no success.So buy this phone and use it until it you have problem.
customer_reviews.author: Edib YILMAZ

customer_reviews.title: Phone looks good and functioned well
customer_reviews.text: Phone looks good and functioned well. However the edges are sleek and quite prone to slip through hold. The LCD of the screen is broken and I cannot even repair it. The screen is cost is about 150$, it's better to buy a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Vijaya

customer_reviews.title: poor, as the price sound
customer_reviews.text: poor, as the price sound. i bought from the site directly. dont buy this phone i just collected the phone yesterday and it is not what the adverts are. the invite is to make people curious for the Phone. Its garbage
customer_reviews.author: Phil1954
